name: PneumococcalVaccineCN_HD_SNOMED
title: Pneumococcal Vaccine CN_HD_SNOMED
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Pneumococcal Vaccine - Adult Care Need.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Pneumococcal Vaccine - Adult Care Need for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: Pneumococcal Vaccine - Adult Care Need for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes that constitute the Flu Vaccine - Adult & Pneumococcal Vaccine - Adult Care Need for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
